entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 11.
